name: Sacrificial Fragments
description: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.

passiveDescription.0: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a <cryo>40%</cryo> chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every <cryo>30</cryo>s.
passiveDescription.1: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a <cryo>50%</cryo> chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every <cryo>26</cryo>s.
passiveDescription.2: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a <cryo>60%</cryo> chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every <cryo>22s</cryo>.
passiveDescription.3: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a <cryo>70%</cryo> chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every <cryo>19</cryo>s.
passiveDescription.4: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a <cryo>80%</cryo> chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every <cryo>16s</cryo>.
